Summary: 5 large black triangles flying from east to west 3 disapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 8:45 as i was going outside to watch the meteor shower we saw somthing that looked like satalite going west but then we saw a lot of smaller stars moving with it in a triangle. Later, we saw 4 more all moving the same way until we went to watch the first one again we looked back and 3 of them were gone. This was such an amazing thing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Colorado City
This sighting has never been favorited.
